forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 65, with temperatures falling to around 63 in the afternoon. North northwest wind 3 to 10 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 51. West southwest wind 2 to 9 mph.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco, the morning greets us with a tranquil glow, promising a day steeped in sunshine. The current atmosphere is painted in soft blues, hinting at pleasant temperatures climbing toward the low 60s, before eventually settling back into the gentle embrace of a cool evening. A subtle, persistent breeze stirs from the north-northwest, just enough to refresh but not disrupt.

Although the forecast celebrates the lack of fog enveloping the city today, a whisper of marine layer lingers, adding a soft texture to the horizon. Miles away, the Golden Gate Bridge stands proud, its red hues cutting through the soft haze of the recently dissipating fog. As day unfolds, one might find joy in a leisurely stroll along the waterfront or a quiet moment enjoying coffee at an outdoor cafe, the world momentarily pausing in the warmth of the sun. Dress in light layers to counter the evening's chill; perhaps a sweater will serve well as you soak in the splendor of a calm and clear day in the heart of this lively city.
